message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $11,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is too low for me. This product has significant value, and I'm confident it will bring you a great return. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
I understand that you're confident in the product's value, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about we try $9,500?
